statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_source = 'Factory'
SELECT emission_date, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000
SELECT emission_id, emission_source FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_offset = TRUE
SELECT emission_id, emission_date, emission_source, emission_amount FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC, emission_id ASC;
SELECT emission_source, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_offset = FALSE GROUP BY emission_source;
SELECT emission_source, AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY emission_source HAVING AVG(emission_amount) > 100;
SELECT emission_source, AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY emission_source ORDER BY avg_emission DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT emission_source, COUNT(emission_id) AS emission_count FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY emission_source HAVING emission_count > 2 ORDER BY emission_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions;
SELECT id, emission_type FROM carbon_emissions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offsets WHERE offset_amount > 100;
SELECT offset_type, offset_timestamp FROM carbon_offsets ORDER BY offset_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_amount, emission_timestamp FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount < 50;
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_amount, emission_timestamp FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100 GROUP BY emission_type
SELECT emission_type, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM carbon_emissions GROUP BY emission_type ORDER BY total_emission DESC
SELECT id, emission_type, offset_amount, offset_timestamp FROM carbon_emissions LEFT JOIN carbon_offsets ON carbon_emissions.id = carbon_offsets.id
SELECT * FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY emission_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM CarbonEmissions;
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_amount FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT offset_type, offset_amount FROM Offsets ORDER BY offset_amount DESC;
SELECT emission_type, emission_amount FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM EmissionsOffsetsLink WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, emission_amount FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 10000 ORDER BY emission_amount ASC;
SELECT emission_type, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM CarbonEmissions GROUP BY emission_type HAVING SUM(emission_amount) > 50000;
SELECT e.id, e.emission_type, o.offset_type FROM CarbonEmissions e JOIN EmissionsOffsetsLink l ON e.id = l.emission_id JOIN Offsets o ON o.id = l.offset_id;
SELECT DISTINCT emission_type FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY emission_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM CarbonEmissions;
SELECT emission_source, emission_date FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT related_emission_id, offset_type FROM EmissionOffsets ORDER BY offset_date DESC;
SELECT tx_id, tx_timestamp, tx_type FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE tx_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT report_date, report_content FROM SustainabilityReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CarbonEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000 ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT offset_type, offset_amount, offset_date FROM EmissionOffsets WHERE offset_amount < 5000 ORDER BY offset_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BlockchainTransactions WHERE tx_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY tx_timestamp DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM SustainabilityReports WHERE report_content LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT c.id, c.emission_source, o.offset_amount FROM CarbonEmissions c INNER JOIN EmissionOffsets o ON c.id = o.related_emission_id WHERE c.emission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM carbon_offsets;
SELECT offset_amount, offset_date FROM carbon_offsets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, address FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT emission_value FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM carbon_offsets WHERE offset_amount > 1000 ORDER BY offset_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT emission_value, emission_date FROM carbon_emissions WHERE emission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number < 1000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT block_hash, miner_id FROM blockchain_info WHERE miner_id = 5 ORDER BY block_hash ASC;
